text: The statue of Taras Shevchenko is an outdoor sculpture by Valentyn Znoba, installed in Smíchov, Prague, in the Czech Republic. ==See also== * Legacy of Taras Shevchenko ==External links== * Category:Monuments and memorials in Prague Category:Outdoor sculptures in Prague Category:Sculptures of men in Prague Category:Statues in Prague Category:Smíchov
title: Statue of Taras Shevchenko, Smíchov
